Texts.Chs: 你应该时常警惕，蜜蜂有一种敌人：^orange;瓦螨^reset;。这种寄生虫会在你的蜂箱内滋生，最终将会杀死蜜蜂。制造一个^orange;抗螨虫巢框^reset;，对付它们。
Texts.Eng: It should be noted that bees have a natural predator: ^orange;Varroa Mites^reset;. These parasites infest your apiaries from time to time, killing your bees. Create an ^orange;anti-mite frame^reset; to combat them.

Texts.Chs: 这类巢框，它能把螨虫^orange;杀死或者赶跑^reset;，如果你好好地使用它们，螨虫将会彻底从你的蜜蜂农场消失！我已经没有养蜂知识教你了，剩余的就要靠你亲自领悟了，祝你好运。
Texts.Eng: Simply placing this in an apiary will work its magic. ^orange;Mites hate these things^reset; and will be killed or driven off by them. Keep some handy. That's all I can teach you. The rest is in your able hands. Good luck!
